1036220.name: Song Animals - Collector's Edition
1036220.description:
Due to free games not remaining in a player's Steam library after uninstalling, this DLC has been created with some additional art content for those who want to keep it in their collection.

It includes:

- Extended version of the game soundtrack by Edwin Montgomery in uncompressed WAV format
- A 10 page pdf book of art by Miriam Joan Montgomery used in the game

The files will be installed in your Song Animals folder within the Steam folder, for example: C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Song Animals\Extras

Soundtrack listing:

1. Song Animals
2. Watercolour Worlds, Part 1
3. Animal March
4. Watercolour Worlds, Part 2
5. Watercolour Worlds, Part 3
6. Islands in the Sky
1036220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
